lead_paragraph: Chelsea goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois has dismissed speculation that he could move to Ligue 1 champions Paris St Germain at the end of the season and insisted he is happy at Stamford Bridge.

headline.print_headline: Courtois Pledges to Stay at Chelsea Next Season
headline.main: Courtois Pledges to Stay at Chelsea Next Season

snippet: Chelsea goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois has dismissed speculation that he could move to Ligue 1 champions Paris St Germain at the end of the season and insisted he is happy at Stamford Bridge....
